title: Understanding the Risks of Gambling
description: Combined chapter merging L-36 (Understanding the Risks of Gambling) and L-37 (The Costs and Benefits of Gambling) into a single comprehensive lesson covering gambling risks, probability, costs, benefits, and responsible decision-making.
georgia_note: Georgia uses L-36 and L-37 SEPARATE (not LC-36)
learning_objectives: Analyze the mathematical probability and expected outcomes of gambling activities
Evaluate the true costs of gambling including financial, emotional, and social impacts
Identify signs of problem gambling and resources for help
Compare gambling activities to legitimate investment strategies
Make informed decisions about gambling using cost-benefit analysis
Understand state and federal regulations governing gambling activities
